dct_description_sm: This point shapefile represents electricity substations in the United States. Data includes owner information, operator information, and location by U.S. state. This layer is from Winter Quarter 2016.

This layer is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing electricity substation data in the United States and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
dct_rights_sm: These data are licensed by Stanford Libraries and are available to Stanford University affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students. Non affiliates seeking access should contact the publisher directly. These data may not be reproduced or used for any purpose without permission.
